South Street", "address2": "", "city": "Kirkland", "state": "IL", "zipCode": "60146", "country": null, "phone": "", "phoneExt": "", "website": "https://sites.vivery.org/kirkland-food-pantry/kirkland-il/1164", "latitude": "42.0914966", "longitude": "-88.8508655", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution", "serviceAreas": "TOWNSHIP/NEIGHBORHOOD:  Kirkland IL and the surrounding rural area", "languages": "", "features": "Air Conditioning", "aboutUs": "The Kirkland Food Pantry is open every Tuesday from 12:00 to 2:00 PM. Residents of Kirkland and the surrounding area who need assistance providing food for their household are encouraged to visit the pantry. There is a good selection of non-perishable food items as well as frozen meats, dairy products, bread, bakery items and produce.  The Kirkland Food Pantry is a joint ministry of the Kirkland Methodist and Lutheran churches. It is run by volunteers from the churches and other members of the community. The pantry is located in the lower level of the Lutheran church.  If you have difficulty with stairs, there is an elevator available.  Please call when you arrive for access to the west door by the elevator.  A Clothes Closet is also available.  ", "notes": "", "contactName": "", "contactPhone": "815-978-2147", "contactEmail": "kirklandfoodpantry@gmail.com", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 2, "regionName": "Northern Illinois Food Bank", "logoBlobNameSmall": "dbf64577-4f05-4753-a6ec-ebbbd9c99e9c.png", "website": "solvehungertoday.org"}], "timeZoneName": "Central Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "CT", "offsetHours": "-5", "schedules": ["Tuesday 12:00 PM-2:00 PM"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
